kv17.10:1.4: Nanu bhagavā dvipadānaṃ aggo, dvipadānaṃ seṭṭho, dvipadānaṃ pamokkho, dvipadānaṃ uttamo, dvipadānaṃ pavaro asamo asamasamo appaṭisamo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggaloti?
kv17.10:1.6: Hañci bhagavā dvipadānaṃ aggo, dvipadānaṃ seṭṭho, dvipadānaṃ pamokkho, dvipadānaṃ uttamo, dvipadānaṃ pavaro asamo asamasamo appaṭisamo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv17.10:2.8: sīlena samādhinā paññāya, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv17.10:4.2: Buddhena seṭṭho ca samo ca vijjati;
kv17.10:5.4: Na vattabbaṃ buddhassa dinnaṃ mahapphalantikathā niṭṭhitā.
